attributes.action: take action against the communist regime of China before they chose to take action on the capitalist west
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: China is an up and coming superpower and within 50 years will wield more influence on the world stage than any other member of the G8 Nations. Communism has proved in the past that it is not to be trusted (USSR) and we cannot allow another cold war. The UK should helm a project to stop the Chinese Communists becoming a threat to the security of not only the UK but the whole of Capitalist society.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
